name: CONverge
description:
Conny got conned into staying inside a little room that isn't what it seems.

Press x to jump and arrow keys to move. Conny can perform wall jumps to either side or one side to avoid obstacles and escape.

Collect fruits for points and arrows to aid you. Every 1000 points will gain you extra life.

This is a high score game so no happy ending for this little chap. Good luck
